con un fuerte enfoque en Front-End y la: with a strong focus on Front-End and creating intuitive, functional digital experiences. I started from scratch in Henry's intensive bootcamp, and since then I've discovered a passion for learning and dedicating myself to code with curiosity and enthusiasm.

Creando interfaces de usuario modernas y: Creating modern, high-performance user interfaces using the latest technologies for a fluid experience.

Desarrollé este proyecto durante el M1 d: I developed this project during Module 1 of the Henry Bootcamp to apply frontend development fundamentals. The goal was to build a static portfolio website and include a controlled form to record a list of things I enjoy, with data stored only in LocalStorage.
Este fue mi primer proyecto Full-stack,: This was my first Full-stack project, designed to practice connecting frontend and backend. The objective was to build a functional movie listing where users could create, store and view movies in a database. It includes a controlled form on the frontend and communication with the backend using Axios.
El proyecto se centra en crear un flujo: The project focuses on creating a complete data flow that allows users to register and authenticate, and then manage their own wine tasting reservations. The solution ensures user autonomy for creating and cancelling bookings and demonstrates the ability to build a simple yet functional system.
Proyecto de especialización en Front End: A Front End specialization project to build a tech e-commerce connected to a provided backend. My goal was to develop a complete, functional Front End including user registration, product browsing, shopping cart and a simulated checkout flow, applying best practices, consistent styling and animations with React, Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
Como parte del proyecto final del bootca: As part of the bootcamp final project, I worked with a team of 6 developers to build a custom food e-commerce. My role focused on front-end development and UI design, aiming to create an intuitive, smooth experience. We implemented a full workflow including a robust authentication system with Auth0 and a simulated Stripe payment gateway. This project was invaluable for teamwork and communication, demonstrating our ability to manage a project end-to-end.
